data.description: Proficiency at the elementary level in listening, speaking, reading and writing, using communicative approaches. Not open to students with credit for LCA LANG 353 prior to Fall 2019.
data.title: FIRST SEMESTER HINDI

data.description: Proficiency at the elementary level in listening, speaking, reading and writing, using communicative approaches. Students with prior experience in the language are required to take a placement test administered by the department. Not open to students with credit for LCA LANG 354 prior to Fall 2019.
data.title: SECOND SEMESTER HINDI
